授業方法: All lectures except Lecture 1-2 (Feb 14) will be conducted via online. Lecture 1-2 will be Face to Face. In the online lecture, you must turn on the video to show your face. Due to the confidentiality of the content, the guest speech on Feb 22 will not be recorded.

All lectures will be Online.

An introduction of the course, expectation from/towards students.

Lecture 5-6

Homework Presentation/Feedback

トピック.授業外学習2:
Homework (total 44 hours expected )
Review and write and present top 3 key learnings from each lectures and reasons and future implementation when you work in multi national companies.
Read the parts of the reference book.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading2: Final individual report(30%) Peer evaluation to the class(10%), Attendance(40%)
